verses.roman:
paṇḍita kahe,--dvāre loka kare gatāyāte
tāra pada-dhūli uḍi' lāge upara bhite

synonyms: paṇḍita kahe—Rāghava Paṇḍita said; dvāre—through the door; loka—people in general; kare—do; gatāyāte—coming and going; tāra—their; pada-dhūli—dust of the feet; uḍi'-being blown; lāge—touches; upara—upward; bhite—the ceiling.
translation: "Rāghava Paṇḍita then said, 'People are always coming and going through that door. The dust from their feet blows up and touches the ceiling.
